name: Cube Block: Classic Puzzle
description:
Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game is an addictive relaxing puzzle game. It challenges you to fit blocks of different shapes into a 10×10 grid. If you like classic, no time limit, totally free elimination game, then you can’t miss it. Play Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game everyday will greatly help you sharpen your mind and soothe your stress. Eliminate blocks with your family, enjoy the relaxing family time, it fits for all ages! I bet you would love it, download NOW!

How to Play:
- Drag and drop blocks into 10×10 grid
- Fill the blocks with a row or column to eliminate them
- Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks
- Blocks CAN'T be rotated
- Reward scores for each step and every row or column of blocks you eliminated
- Get as more scores as you can to become the best block crush at Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game!

Features of Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game:
- Completely free to play
- Truly enjoy the fun of puzzle game: NO wifi needed
- Relaxing game environment: NO time limit
- Best family game choice: Game for all ages
- Innovation in the classics: Provide a grid to place a temporarily unwanted block
- Brand New combo mode: 4 times or more combo will cause a round of shaking, helps you relax your body in the moment of eliminating the blocks
- Brisk game sound effects keeps you immersed in this puzzle game
- Quick to understand rules, easy to control
- Elaborate interface, let you experience the simple happiness.
- Constantly update the various shapes of blocks, keeps you feel challenging.
- Simple and addictive! Once you start, you won't stop playing!
- Support game scores recording, support friend rankings, come and reduce your stress at Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game!

For your happier and relaxing life Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game also offers:
- Brain Training:
Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game is a classic simple game but are full of challenges, it has logic skills and placement strategies, whether it is very first or later move, each step determines whether you can get high scores.
We aim to help you to keep your mind sharp, play just 3 Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game everyday, if getting a high score is easier and easier for you, congratulations, your brain power has improved!
- Recognition Increase:
Play Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game with your children, it helps your little girl/boy increase recognition, improve memory.
You can also try to play Beetle Block: Classic Puzzle Game with your parents everyday, this classic puzzle game is definitely the best block puzzle to keep your parents’ mind active and healthy.
- Stress Reduction:
Share Beetle Block: Classic Puzzle Game with your friend, you can spend a pleasant afternoon together and drive away the pressure unconsciously.
Excellent antidote to stress, with Cube Block: Classic Puzzle Game you can divert your brain during tense moments. Amuse yourself for hours without being very attentive, it’s a stress therapy!
